verses.verse: I exhort <WG3870> <WG5719> therefore <WG3767>, that, first <WG4412> of all <WG3956>, supplications <WG1162>, prayers <WG4335>, intercessions <WG1783>, and giving of thanks <WG2169>, be made <WG4160> <WG5745> for <WG5228> all <WG3956> men <WG444>;

For <WG5228> kings <WG935>, and <WG2532> for all <WG3956> that are <WG5607> <WG5752> in <WG1722> authority <WG5247>; that <WG2443> we may lead <WG1236> <WG5725> a quiet <WG2263> and <WG2532> peaceable <WG2272> life <WG979> in <WG1722> all <WG3956> godliness <WG2150> and <WG2532> honesty <WG4587>.
For <WG1063> this <WG5124> is good <WG2570> and <WG2532> acceptable <WG587> in the sight <WG1799> of 'Elohim <WG2316> our <WG2257> Saviour <WG4990>;
Who <WG3739> will have <WG2309> <WG5719> all <WG3956> men <WG444> to be saved <WG4982> <WG5683>, and <WG2532> to come <WG2064> <WG5629> unto <WG1519> the knowledge <WG1922> of the truth <WG225>.

For <WG1063> there is one <WG1520> 'Elohim <WG2316>, and <WG2532> one <WG1520> mediator <WG3316> between 'Elohim <WG2316> and <WG2532> men <WG444>, the man <WG444> Moshiach <WG5547> Yeshuw`a <WG2424>;
Who <WG3588> gave <WG1325> <WG5631> himself <WG1438> a ransom <WG487> for <WG5228> all <WG3956>, to be testified <WG3142> in due <WG2398> time <WG2540>.

Whereunto <WG1519> <WG3739> I <WG1473> am ordained <WG5087> <WG5681> a preacher <WG2783>, and <WG2532> an emissary <WG652>, (I speak <WG3004> <WG5719> the truth <WG225> in <WG1722> Moshiach <WG5547>, and lie <WG5574> <WG5736> not <WG3756>;) a teacher <WG1320> of the goyim <WG1484> in <WG1722> faith <WG4102> and <WG2532> verity <WG225>.

I will <WG1014> <WG5736> therefore <WG3767> that men <WG435> pray <WG4336> <WG5738> every <WG1722> <WG3956> where <WG5117>, lifting up <WG1869> <WG5723> holy <WG3741> hands <WG5495>, without <WG5565> wrath <WG3709> and <WG2532> doubting <WG1261>.

In like manner <WG5615> also <WG2532>, that women <WG1135> adorn <WG2885> <WG5721> themselves <WG1438> in <WG1722> modest <WG2887> apparel <WG2689>, with <WG3326> shamefacedness <WG127> and <WG2532> sobriety <WG4997>; not <WG3361> with <WG1722> broided hair <WG4117>, or <WG2228> gold <WG5557>, or <WG2228> pearls <WG3135>, or <WG2228> costly <WG4185> array <WG2441>;
But <WG235> (which <WG3739> becometh <WG4241> <WG5719> women <WG1135> professing <WG1861> <WG5740> godliness <WG2317>) with <WG1223> good <WG18> works <WG2041>.
Let <WG3129> the woman <WG1135> learn <WG3129> <WG5720> in <WG1722> silence <WG2271> with <WG1722> all <WG3956> subjection <WG5292>.

But <WG1161> I suffer <WG2010> <WG5719> not <WG3756> a woman <WG1135> to teach <WG1321> <WG5721>, nor <WG3761> to usurp authority <WG831> <WG5721> over the man <WG435>, but <WG235> to be <WG1511> <WG5750> in <WG1722> silence <WG2271>.
For <WG1063> Adam <WG76> was <WG4111> first <WG4413> formed <WG4111> <WG5681>, then <WG1534> Havah <WG2096>.

And <WG2532> Adam <WG76> was <WG538> not <WG3756> deceived <WG538> <WG5681>, but <WG1161> the woman <WG1135> being deceived <WG538> <WG5685> was <WG1096> <WG5754> in <WG1722> the transgression <WG3847>.

Notwithstanding <WG1161> she shall be saved <WG4982> <WG5701> in <WG1223> childbearing <WG5042>, if <WG1437> they continue <WG3306> <WG5661> in <WG1722> faith <WG4102> and <WG2532> charity <WG26> and <WG2532> holiness <WG38> with <WG3326> sobriety <WG4997>.
